table.Name: wcms_Language
table.Title: #Languages
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = (select count(0) from wcms_Language { where Language_ID <o> @Search:Language_ID }) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Language_ID] ,[Language_Name] ,[Language_Code] ,[Language_Default] ,[Language_Culture] ,[Language_O] ,case when [Language_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Language_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Language_ID] ,[Language_Name] ,[Language_Code] ,[Language_Default] ,[Language_Culture] ,[Language_O] ,[Language_A] from wcms_Language { where Language_ID <o> @Search:Language_ID } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: update wcms_Language set [Language_A]= @active where Language_ID = @editID select @editID
